summary: The diff implements most of the requested requirements. REQ-1 (admin email credential), REQ-2 (content management), REQ-3 (registrations tab with search/filter/CSV), and REQ-4 (analytics card + ProtectedRoute) are all substantially addressed. However, the backend admin-only endpoint authorization rejecting non-admin principals relies on AccessControl but the MixinAuthorization integration is only partially visible due to truncation. One hallucinated feature (GalleryManager) is present that was not requested. The REQ-4 AC about redirecting /admin/* while unauthenticated is partially implemented since only /admin/dashboard is wrapped in ProtectedRoute.

missing_requirements.requirement: Navigating to /admin/* while unauthenticated redirects to the admin login page
missing_requirements.reason: Only /admin/dashboard is wrapped with ProtectedRoute in App.tsx. There is no catch-all protection for other /admin/* sub-routes; only the single dashboard route is protected.

hallucinated_features.description: GalleryManager component for uploading and deleting gallery images, with a dedicated Gallery tab in the Admin Dashboard
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention gallery management as a requirement. Neither REQ-1 through REQ-4 nor the non-goals mention anything about a gallery upload/delete admin feature.
